name: cheesecake
content:
cheesecake noun
(FOOD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a cake made from a layer of biscuit, or a sweet pastry base, covered with soft cheese, eggs, sugar, and sometimes fruit: lemon/almond cheesecake
Foodcollection/GettyImages

a cake made from a sweet pastry base covered with a mixture of soft cheese, eggs, sugar, and sometimes fruit: [ U ] I like strawberry cheesecake.
